jd: From: Anand Prajapati, Vyzeinc aprajapati@vyzeinc.com Reply to: aprajapati@vyzeinc.com Job Description -Please provide only genuine consultantsNeed LinkedIn and managerial referencesJob Title: Oracle DBA (100% interview)Location: Washington, DC HybridDuration: 12+ months MOI: Skype (1 & done)Job Description:I have an opening for a Oracle DBA to work hybrid in DC. This will be up to 4 days a week on site. The top skills needed are Exadata, experience with databases other than Oracle (ideally SQL Server or Postgres), and Dremio. Enterprise financial experience is preferred. The interview process is one and done. With submissions please include LinkedIn profiles and managerial references. Below is rest of the JD Overall 12+ years of IT industry experience7+ years of experience as DBA in Oracle 11g/12c/18c/19c in Red Hat Linux using ASM storage and ext3 file systems.Must have recent financial experienceExperience in PostgreSQL and SQL Server is also mandatory (at least 1 year).Unix Shell Scripting experience is required (at least 1 year).Experience in Oracle Transparent Data encryption.Knowledge of Azure data services is a plus.Extensive experience in Oracle RAC.Experience in operating Oracle in the Cloud is a plus.Experience with Oracle Exadata is required.Relevant experience with Oracle RAC in Red Hat Linux platform.Relevant experience with Oracle ASM file system.Relevant experience with RMAN for backup and recovery.Relevant experience in use of ITIL processes.Relevant experience for SOX/ICFR compliance of critical financial systems.Business Analyst Specialist QualificationsStrong written and verbal communication. Ability to effectively communicate at all levels of leadership.Advanced Excel skills. Proficiency in utilizing advanced features of Excel for data analysis and reporting.Financial budget management experience. Experience in managing financial budgets and forecasting.Operational background. Understanding of operational processes and ability to improve efficiency.Ability to work with reporting tools like Jira, Confluence, and SharePoint: Experience in using reporting tools to analyze data and present insights.Experience in the financial service industry, demonstrate leadership abilities, and be able to work on operational tasks preferred. Prior experience in project management or business management roles is preferred, along with a background in mortgage banking or finance.Familiarity with Tableau is desirable.
